questions.question: What does GIS stand for in the context of geospatial development?
Which of the following is NOT a type of geospatial data?
What is a common file format for vector geospatial data?
Which Python library is primarily used for working with geospatial data in data frames?
What is the purpose of the Shapely library in geospatial development?
choices: To perform geometric operations on shapes
questions.answer: To perform geometric operations on shapes

questions.question: Which file format is commonly used for exchanging geospatial data on the web?
What type of geospatial data represents the world as a continuous surface?
Which Python library is used for reading and writing raster geospatial data?
What is a spatial join in geospatial analysis?
choices: Merging datasets based on spatial relationships
questions.answer: Merging datasets based on spatial relationships

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of vector data?
What does DEM stand for in geospatial context?
Which library is commonly used for adding interactive maps to web applications in Python?
What is the primary purpose of creating a buffer in geospatial analysis?
choices: To create a zone around a feature for proximity analysis
To smooth out jagged edges in vector data
To increase the resolution of raster data
To compress geospatial files for storage
questions.answer: To create a zone around a feature for proximity analysis

questions.question: Which Python library is used for adding basemaps to static maps?
What is a common use of spatial queries in geospatial analysis?
choices: To find features that meet specific spatial criteria
To convert vector data to raster data
questions.answer: To find features that meet specific spatial criteria

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a typical component of a coordinate reference system?
What is the purpose of the GeoPandas 'sjoin' function?
choices: To perform spatial joins between geodataframes
To split a geodataframe into multiple parts
To join non-spatial data to a geodataframe
To create a new spatial index
questions.answer: To perform spatial joins between geodataframes

questions.question: Which type of map distortion is minimized in an equal-area projection?
What is the primary purpose of the Fiona library in Python's geospatial ecosystem?
choices: To read and write geospatial data files
questions.answer: To read and write geospatial data files

questions.question: Which of the following is an advantage of vector data over raster data?
What does the term 'topology' refer to in geospatial data?
choices: The color scheme used in maps

questions.question: Which Python library is commonly used for complex spatial analysis and modeling?
What is the purpose of geocoding in geospatial analysis?
choices: Encoding geospatial data for secure transmission
Creating unique identifiers for geospatial features

questions.question: Which of the following is a characteristic of the Web Mercator projection?
What is the primary purpose of a spatial index in geospatial databases?
choices: To improve the performance of spatial queries
To convert between different coordinate systems
questions.answer: To improve the performance of spatial queries

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a common type of spatial analysis operation?
What is the main advantage of using GeoPandas over standard Pandas for geospatial data?
choices: Native support for geometric operations and spatial indexing
questions.answer: Native support for geometric operations and spatial indexing

questions.question: Which projection is most suitable for mapping areas near the poles?
What is the primary purpose of the PyProj library in geospatial development?
Which of the following is a key consideration when choosing a map projection?
choices: The purpose of the map and the area being mapped
The color scheme of the map
questions.answer: The purpose of the map and the area being mapped
